content.rendered:
LOGIN
JION

Get Rebates Daily

Home » Promotions » get rebates daily

Get Rebates Daily Up To 1%!

Get Rebates Daily Promotion Details:

Jiliaaa is here to supercharge your gaming experience every day with our “Get Rebates Daily Up To 1%” promotion. This special offer is designed to reward our loyal players with a daily cashback, giving you more reasons to play your favorite online casino and JILI slots games. Here’s all you need to know to take advantage of this exciting promotion:

Eligibility: This promotion is open to all registered players at Jiliaaa. Your journey to daily rewards starts with a simple login.

Offer: Enjoy a daily rebate of up to 1% on your total wagers, regardless of the game’s outcome. Whether you win or lose, you get something back!


1. Daily Rebates: Rebates are calculated daily from 00:00 to 23:59 and will be issued the next day before 3:00PM in Manila time (GMT+8).
2. Daily rebates are awarded daily and are subject to 1x wagering before withdrawals are made.

Important Notes:
1. Sabong and lottery games do not participate in any rebate distribution.

2. Rebate needs 1 times turnover, no game limit.

3. Remember to collect your betting rebate every day.


Terms and Conditions:
1. Only one account per player is allowed. no same ip address, bank account, and contact number allowed. players who have multiple or fraudulent accounts will not be qualified for this promotion.

2. JILIAAA reserves the right to revoke all bonuses given to any member if they are found abusing this promotion.

3. JILIAAA reserves the right to amend or cancel this promotion at any time.

4. General  JILIAAA terms and conditions apply.
